game.name: Monster 4x4 Hill Climb Sims
game.description:
All 4x4 truck lovers are going to have a blast today on their favourite vehicles! Are you also one of those who love racing monster 4x4 trucks? If yes, you should try out this brand new racing game where you have to control an exclusively-designed monster truck on the off-road tracks. Not everyone dares to face off the challenge designed here in this off road racing challenge. So enter this unique track only if you are skilled enough to drive 4x4 monster trucks on the impossible tracks.

Race through the immersive environment and get ready to feel the new endless offroad adventure like never before! Do not forget to earn money and upgrade your jeep to make your gameplay more challenging and interesting. Try to grab as much coins as you can before the time expires! Track your money and how much time is left by looking at the top left corner of the screen in this HTML5 truck game! Be careful and refill your vehicle when the fuel runs out!

Navigate your chosen truck through the amazing terrains and mountains in this awesome driving simulator! Put your driving abilities to the test to handle your vehicle along the hills and dangerous vertigo paths! Mountain roads are not straight so do not forget to slow down your car to avoid falling down. We are pretty sure that this hill climb monster truck racing challenge promises you to deliver the matchless fun and entertainment for hours. No need to install any specific app or software to play this racing game!
